page.title: 06Passenham.(cont.)
page.content:
The Rectory was built around the 19th Century but while an excavation took place several years ago it was found that the history of Passenham dated back to Saxon times.
Supernatural - The 2 most famous ghosts of Passenham are Nancy Webb and Bobby Banister. The ghost of Nancy Webb has often been seen on the night of Deanshanger Feast. She always wore a white,silk dress and carried a baby in her arms. She would throw herself into the stream and get crushed by the mill wheel. The Manor House is said to be haunted by the ghost of Bobby Bannister. People have seen the skeleton form of a huntsman with a broken neck dragged in the stirrup.
